translations.name: The Bible in Tiv 1992 Edition
translations.description:
A reprint of the 1st Bible in Tiv originally published under the title 'Bibilo ka Kwaghôron U Aôndo Je La ka Ikuryan I Tse Kua I He Cii': British and Foreign Bible Society: London, 1964.
Old Testament translated, and New Testament revised, by J.F. Orffer, D. du Toit van der Merwe and W.D. Gerryts, all of the Dutch Reformed Church of South Africa, assisted by Buter Agba and Shawon Ndur.
